vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
μίσθ-ωμα, ατος, τό,
price agreed on in hiring, contract-price, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; a courtesan's price, Machoap.[Refs 3rd c.BC+]
__2 contract, μισθοῦσι μισθώματα farm out contracts, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; ἀπὸ μισθωμάτων θύειν by contract, [Refs 5th c.BC+] (but explained as from the proceeds of rents by [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__3 rent, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II that which is let for hire, hired house, [NT]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
rented house, rented lodging home
hire, rent;, in NT a hired dwelling, rented lodging Acts 28:30*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: gasto, arriendo, alquiler ; casa alquilada o arrendada
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 租的東西, 租的房子 (徒 28:30)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 租的东西, 租的房子 (徒 28:30)
